characterList: 陌隙陡障陪隧墜陋挖窯窺窟窄榨窘窮窩腔

characters.story: The white stands for footpath, shouting "Mwo!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
"Shee!" Pinnacle with few springs commanded sharply - a rift, gap, crack and crevice!
A striking symbol for steep that whispers "Doh" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The thread stands for barrier, shouting "Jahng!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
This character represents accompany, asking "Pay? Escort?" curiously!
The strokes unite to show tunnel, shouting "Sway!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
See how the soil forms plunge? It shouts "Jway!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
An striking symbol for undesirable that shouts "Loh!" sharply!
Like a hand, this character means dig and sings "Wah!" reached by outstretched fingers!
See how the fire forms kiln? It asks "Yao? Oven?" curiously!
The strokes unite to show peep, singing "Kway!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
See how the stone forms den? It sings "Koo!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show strait, whispering "Jigh" softly - a vivid image to remember!
Like a tree, this character means extract and shouts "Jah!"!
Picture poverty-stricken taking form - it whispers "Jyohng" with vivid energy!
See how the body forms poor? It whispers "Chyohng" softly - a vivid image to remember!
Picture hollow taking form - it sings "Woh!" with vivid energy!
"Chyahng!" Empty flesh sang cheerfully - body cavity, chamber, accent, Taiwan sandhi!
